text: Unibuke ubwo Nyagasani wawe yazanaga (roho zose za) bene Adamu n’iz’urubyaro ruzaturuka mu migongo yabo, maze akazishyira imbere ye akazibwira ati "Ese si njye Nyagasani wanyu?
